content: Expand your search to reputable news sources and return the most recent article title related to the environmental impact of rising temperatures caused by greenhouse gas emissions, commonly referred to as global warming.

I don’t have real-time internet access to pull in the most recent articles. However, I recommend checking reputable news sources such as BBC News, The New York Times, The Guardian, or National Geographic for the latest articles on the environmental impact of rising temperatures due to greenhouse gas emissions. You can also use online databases like Google News to find the most current information.
